snippet: At a joint news conference, the two leaders pledged not to allow Russia and China to block international action to stop the bloodshed in Syria.
abstract: Chancellor Angela Merkel of Germany and President Nicolas Sarkozy of France pledge not to allow Russia and China to block international action to stop the bloodshed in Syria, and promise to help the Syrian people; also call for Greece to come to terms quickly with the European Union and the International Monetary Fund on cuts to its budget, or face default on its debts.
lead_paragraph: At a joint news conference, the two leaders pledged not to allow Russia and China to block international action to stop the bloodshed in Syria.

headline.seo: Merkel and Sarkozy Address Syria, Greece and French Election
headline.main: Merkel and Sarkozy Share Anger Over Syria Stalemate and Urgency Over Greece
